name: You Must Survive (pgbassist)
description:
In the safety of your own home, where you know every corner, you see yourself trapped, unable to leave, by a mysterious entity who randomly pick you as the next target to do random tasks in order to escape your own house.

Walk around the gloomy corridors and dark rooms to do as you are told to do, hearing wierd voices and steps around the house, not knowing if there is someone just as you enter a room or if is safe to roam around.

At least the entity said you'll be unharmed.
